title: Escape into the Blue
description: It's finally here! The super talented, narrator and songstress Megan Meyer has been hard at work in her sound studio and you can now enjoy Escape Into The Blue while you garden, drive or just sit back, relax and listen in. "A suspenseful beach read with a splash of crime." Look for this title, now on Audible!In the shimmering depths of ESCAPE INTO THE BLUE, Sophia's quest for solace turns perilous. Haunted by tragedy, she chases a dreamy Caribbean escape, only to plunge into a world of dark secrets, seductive illusions, and dangerous alliances. As she navigates treacherous waters of wealth and deception, Sophia's journey intertwines with a free spirit who offers hope amidst the shadows.But with sharks circling and illusions shattering, can she unearth the truth before it consumes her?Prepare for a Caribbean odyssey where paradise masks peril and every wave carries haunting whispers of betrayal.
author: Bibiana Krall
